name: PaidTasks
short_description: Create task lists with paid tasks and public payment pages

permissions.label: Access extension database
permissions.description: Read and write data in the paidtasks extension database.

permissions.label: Create or pay invoices
permissions.description: Call POST /api/v1/payments to create or pay invoices.

permissions.label: Watch invoice payments
permissions.description: Register a backend watcher for a payment hash.
